snippet: ROTHMAN--Judith Lee. We mourn the loss of our beloved Judy who passed away on February 9th, surrounded by lifelong friends. Her wisdom, guidance and love will be an inspiration to all who knew her. She will be in our hearts forever. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROTHMAN--Judith Lee. We mourn the loss of our beloved Judy who passed away on February 9th, surrounded by lifelong friends. Her wisdom, guidance and love will be an inspiration to all who knew her. She will be in our hearts forever. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROTHMAN, JUDITH LEE
